title: The Box
description: Years after a Montana man is found dead, his son dreads what he’ll find when he opens up the box of case files, giving him insight into what really happened. Keith Morrison reports on his journey and the murder investigation that unraveled a revenge plot. Originally aired on NBC on October 25, 2019.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
